about_the_game:
"Drown in the Disgrace" is Soul at Stake One-year Anniversary Special DLC, including an Anniversary Special Devil "the Drowner".

EXTRA BONUS

The Drowner's gesture*1 and the Drowner's exclusive trump*5.

NEW DEVIL: THE DROWNER

All the hopes are dead. Be it the lover who never comes back, or the sun that is never going to rise... All of them!

THE DROWNER'S ABILITY

Sink: The Drowner traps the Gamblers in a sink instead of hitting them. Gamblers have to free themselves or get rescued in 120 seconds, or will be seriously wounded when the sink drowns them. Captured Gamblers may attempt to flee from the sink with probabilities of 50%/40%/30%.

Venom: The Drowner may teleport a distance to the front and leave a pond there (Up to 4 in total). The first Gambler stepping on the pond is cursed to be seen as a pair of red shoes and be sensed by the Devil for 10 seconds. Cursed Gambler will transfer the curse to a cardholder when they touch it, and the next Gambler touching the same cardholder carries on the curse.

THE DROWNER'S CHEATS

Isolation: Cursed Gambler will need 5 seconds extra time/10 seconds extra time/be unable to be rescued from the Sink by peer Gamblers. Cleansed people don't need anyone by their side.

Deterioration: Gamblers staying within 10 meters of the cursed Gambler or cardholder for 10 seconds expose their aura to the Drowner for 5/10/15 seconds.

THE DROWNER'S EXCLUSIVE TRUMP

Gloat: Whenever a Gambler is cursed, the radius of the sink is expanded by 5% (20% max).

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a chase and slash game mode that uses sharp or blunt weapons, the screen will have a blood splash effect on a successful attack and during the execution event. The setting option "Bloody Mode" is available in the game. Turning off the "Bloody Mode" can remove the blood effects and has a mosaic occlusion when executed.
